| ------------------ | ------------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `referenceElement` | `reference-element` |             | `HTMLElement`                            | `undefined` |
| `tooltipLocked`    | `tooltip-locked`    |             | `boolean`                                | `false`     |
| `tooltipText`      | `tooltip-text`      |             | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `tooltipTitle`     | `tooltip-title`     |             | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
